text:
The mime type text/x-component should be added for files ending in htc into
/etc/mime.types

These are javascript behavior files.

Unless this is added IE doesn't load them properly.
creator: gregfelix@byu.edu

text:
Wow, MSIE actually pays attention to a mime type?  That's a surprise ;-)

But anyway, our policy on additions to mime.types is here:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/mod/mod_mime.html#typesconfig
creator: slive@apache.org
